name: Robopong
description:
You've woken up in an abandoned robot production factory. The robots have gone rogue! You'll have to beat them in Robopong. Do it for the humans.

I made the game a few weeks ago and added a bit of polish and proc gen'd art for Procjam 2018. I've got a bunch more ideas for some procedural art and hope to get to them soon!

It was inspired by this rad box art for an old Atari Lynx game:
